resources.string: As-salamu alaykum. The main objective of this application is to make it easier to pray for people who received Islam as their religion later in life unlike the people born in an Islamic family. So, they usually don’t have much knowledge about the ways of Islam and don’t have the Surahs memorized to offer Salah. These things also true for many other people who were born in Islamic family but forgot or didn’t learn the Surahs and thus having trouble to offer Salah. So, we came up with the idea of building an app that will help Muslims to make their prayer even if they don’t memorize the Surahs. Our app also has the features for learning the Arabic letters and memorizing the Surahs which are usually used in Salah. It also provides the rules of offering salah. This app is a complete package for offering Salah.
Allows users to select specific prayers and Surahs.
Allows users to read and listen to Surahs.
Allow users to learn the meaning of the Surahs.
Allow users to learn Arabic alphabets.
Allow users to listen to Azan whenever they want.
Helps to learn about the rules of Salah.
We are students, studying in Computer Science and Engineeringwhose aim is to help people who wants to offer their prayer but facing difficulties.
